meanings.sent1: The pepperminty candy cane was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent2: Her breath was fresh and pepperminty after chewing gum.

meanings.sent4: The air in the room was filled with a pepperminty aroma.
meanings.sent5: The pepperminty tea warmed her up on a cold winter day.
